name: Poulpe Fiction - Interactive scene
description:
(Play with sound and fullscreen 1920x1080) 

After creating a cute and small creepy alien octopus, I imagined a staging to showcase it in Unity. Here is the result, a kind of 2 minutes clip that runs in a loop where you play a luminous entity in the abyss. Like a dream... or a nightmare. 

More information here: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/oOo9AJ
